oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Margaret McClarty Maxwell to Edwin W. R. Maxwell
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Margaret McClarty Maxwell to her husband, Edwin W. R. Maxwell (May 16, 1805 - August 15, 1873), defending the scarcity and brevity of her previous letters and relaying family news. They had nine children.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
